description: Lists all the available versions for the specified Amazon Q in Connect message template.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: messageTemplateId
parameters.description: The identifier of the message template. Can be either the ID or the ARN. It cannot contain any qualifier.

nested_items.name: messageTemplateVersionSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information about the versions of a message template.

nested_items.name: messageTemplateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the message template.

nested_items.name: messageTemplateId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the message template.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the message template.

nested_items.name: channelSubtype
nested_items.description: The channel subtype this message template applies to.

nested_items.name: isActive
nested_items.description: Whether the version of the message template is activated.

nested_items.name: versionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the message template version.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
